doc.previous: Einstein conducted other investigations that were unsuccessful and abandoned These pertain to force superconductivity gravitational waves and other research
doc.after: In addition to longtime collaborators Leopold Infeld Nathan Rosen Peter Bergmann and others Einstein also had some one shot collaborations with various scientists
